The Not Long and Wine-ding Road

© copyright 2016 Des Moines Bicycle Collective

  • Home
  • Hours
  • Contact
  • Events

In 2015 your financial support made possible:

Empower
More than 350 bicycles and helmets were donated to children in need by partnering with community nonprofits and public schools.

Share
With over 6,000 trips and four new stations, Des Moines BCycle has more than doubled the number of rides over last year.

Reuse
Thousands of donated tubes, tires, frames and other bike parts were kept out of overburdened landfills.

Accessibility
Our community workspace is now open to the public six days a week – including Sundays!

Educate
Over 2,000 people visited the Collective and learned something about keeping their bicycles working properly.
